;;; TOOL: run-roundtrip
;;; ARGS: --stdout --enable-exceptions
(module
  (tag $e0 (param i32))

  (func
    try
    catch $e0
      rethrow 0
    end
  )
)
(;; STDOUT ;;;
(module
  (type (;0;) (func (param i32)))
  (type (;1;) (func))
  (func (;0;) (type 1)
    try  ;; label = @1
    catch 0
      rethrow 0 (;@1;)
    end)
  (tag (;0;) (type 0) (param i32)))
;;; STDOUT ;;)
